answers.answer: "..should I see my doctor soon?" Why wait? If you gas gauge needle in your cars is on empty do you wait until you run out of gas before you hit the filling station? Please go see your Dr asap and get well.

You should eat a small meal every 4 hours when you are diabetic.  If you eat a big meal (or wrong food) in the evening your blood sugar will shoot up and you will feel good.  During th early hours of the morning the blood sugar levels will drop and you wake up feeling bad.  Try and eat a wholewheat sandwich with chicken breast (no mayonaise!) and tomatoe or something similar (low fat, low sugar) just before going to sleep.  When you wake in the morning eat a Provita (or any wholewheat biscuit) immediately before you drink coffee.

question: I have type 2 diabetes, every morning I feel real nauses like a women feels when she is pregnant. I can't stand the smell of food early in the morning so it is hard for me to eat breakfast. Not pregnant can not have any more kids. Sometimes I do feel light headed if I don't eat breakfast. what can I do about this or should I see my doctor soon?
title: Daily problems with Diabetes
